title: A Letter to Amy
creator_credit: Weston Woods Studios, Morton Schindel and Cynthia Freitag
brief_description: Tells the story of Peter, a young African American boy, who is planning his birthday party. Shows him pondering over the invitation letter and then anxiously awaiting the party day to see if she comes. Concludes with Amy arriving very late, thus making the party a happy one.
